contents: 基础用法，通过v-model双向绑定，值为时间字符串，并非Date对象。添加multiple属性可以支持多选；通过min max属性可以指定最小最大可选时间

highlighted.content:
import Timepicker from 'kpc/components/timepicker';

<div>
    <Timepicker v-model="time" min="01:34:56" max="15:02:59" />
    You selected: {{ self.get('time') }}
    <br /><br />
    <Timepicker v-model="timeArray" multiple clearable />
    You selected: {{ JSON.stringify(self.get('timeArray')) }}
</div>

import Intact from 'intact';
import template from './index.vdt';

export default class extends Intact {
    @Intact.template()
    static template = template;
}

<template>
    <div>
        <Timepicker v-model="time" min="01:34:56" max="15:02:59" />
        You selected: {{ time }}
        <br /><br />
        <Timepicker v-model="timeArray" multiple clearable />
        You selected: {{ stringify(timeArray) }}
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import Timepicker from 'kpc-vue/components/timepicker';

export default {
    components: {
        Timepicker
    },
    data() {
        return {
            "time": null,
            "timeArray": null
        }
    },
    methods: {
        stringify(data) { return JSON.stringify(data); },
    },
}
</script>

import React from 'react';
import Timepicker from 'kpc-react/components/timepicker';

export default class Demo extends React.Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.state = {};
    }

    render() {
        return (
            <div>
                <Timepicker value={this.state.time} on$change-value={(c, time) => this.setState({time})} min="01:34:56" max="15:02:59" />
                You selected: {this.state.time}
                <br /><br />
                <Timepicker value={this.state.timeArray} on$change-value={(c, timeArray) => this.setState({timeArray})} multiple clearable />
                You selected: {JSON.stringify(this.state.timeArray)}
            </div>
        )
    }
}

import {Component} from '@angular/core';

@Component({
    selector: 'app-demo',
    template: `
        <div>
            <k-timepicker [(value)]="time" min="01:34:56" max="15:02:59"></k-timepicker>
            You selected: {{ time }}
            <br /><br />
            <k-timepicker [(value)]="timeArray" [multiple]="true" [clearable]="true"></k-timepicker>
            You selected: {{ timeArray | json }}
        </div>
    `,
})
export class AppDemoComponent {
    private time;
    private timeArray;
}
